ygData.subject: Offer of Assitance to Hell Beast
ygData.msgSnippet: Shockwave: Shockwave s long range sensor sweeps detected the battle between Killfest s Predacon rebels and Hell Beast and Megatron s forces. Opening a comm.

Subject: Offer of Assitance to Hell Beast
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
X-Mailer: CompuServe 2000 32-bit sub 107
From: KSLawdogg@...

Shockwave:




Shockwave's long range sensor sweeps detected the battle between Killfest's 
Predacon rebels and Hell Beast and Megatron's forces.

Opening a comm. unit to Hell Beast inside his ice cave, Shockwave spoke frank 
because of the cold outside.

"Hell Beast, this is Shockwave.  In a show of good faith I am willing to lead 
some of your forces to aid you in your battle against the dissident Killfest. 
 Respond soon."
